data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
First off, Mail::Vacation doesn't work and the author is
    unresponsive. I propose a new namespace within the Email::
    namespace.

    My plan is to use this namespace for code for building email
    autoresponders, ie: vacation autoresponders. Mail::AutoReply will be
    usable from within a ~/.procmailrc file, as an Email::Filter plugin,
    etc.
